name: First Sin (itch)
description:
This is a short piece of interactive narrative to introduce players to the world of an ongoing game project.

Enter a dark world were demons are more common than dogs and most of the few remaining humans huddle in an isolated bastion. The remainder? Well it's up to you to see if you have what it takes to go out and face what's out there.

Do you have the will and the yearning to become a Sin-Eater?

Expect to take 10-15 minutes to plat through from beginning to end.
